function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low room to member ratio","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission due to overcrowding","Mitigation":"Implement social distancing measures, reduce occupancy, and improve ventilation","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems, occupancy sensors","People":"Residents, building occupants","Owner":"Building management, local authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate noise insulation and acoustics","Impact":"Reduced acoustic comfort could lead to stress and reduced well-being","Mitigation":"Improve noise insulation, implement acoustic zoning, and use low-noise equipment","Technologies":"Soundproofing materials, acoustic panels, low-noise equipment","People":"Residents, building occupants","Owner":"Building management, construction companies"},{"Description":"Limited availability of self-dependent services","Impact":"Dependency on external supply chains during quarantine, leading to shortages and virus spread","Mitigation":"Establish local self-sustaining supply chains for food and medical essentials","Technologies":"Urban farming, community gardens, local food production facilities","People":"Local residents, community members","Owner":"Local authorities, property developers"}]}
